MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD8 and TD9 postcode areas of Jedburgh and Hawick. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.19AM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and is still working to repair a grounded overhead line affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 9.45AM on 30 January 2021.
